title: Can't get Client to Open
body:
Hello i upgraded to MacOS Sierra public beta last night and have since not been able to get the client to open.  Anyone know why I'm not able to launch the client?  

Thanks!

P.S:  The Alpha client opens and runs smoothly on the Sierra beta!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I was able to confirm that your ticket was successfully received, and a specialist will help out as soon as possible!  The issue you are experiencing may be due to a permissions issue blocking access to your League of Legends files and folders.  In the meantime, we have a [Mac Administration Settings](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434#mq3) guide that can help configure your permissions.  Hope that helps!

Same over here. Oh well, that's to be expected when we try the latest and greatest the second it comes out!

If only I had an Alpha client account ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Garbage Yasuo,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3erTJIpj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-09T15:48:12.871+0000)
>
> Same over here. Oh well, that's to be expected when we try the latest and greatest the second it comes out!
> 
> If only I had an Alpha client account ^^

Downside is I can't play ranked on the alpha client :(

I submitted a support ticket as well and if I get an update I'll be sure to comment on here so you(or anyone else for that matter) knows the outcome.

> [{quoted}](name=Tyroneology,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3erTJIpj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T16:02:19.961+0000)
>
> Downside is I can't play ranked on the alpha client :(
> 
> I submitted a support ticket as well and if I get an update I'll be sure to comment on here so you(or anyone else for that matter) knows the outcome.

Thank you so much!
